Translations.Text: Ini: "a Mass iw! Lemmer a yi d Tesseknev acu i sen ippuaahden
A Mass iw, ur iyi Ppara deg ugdud imednas
S tidep, Nezmer ad ak Nessken acu i sen Naahed
Err akin tucmip s lfayeq. Nekwni Neeoa, sennig wiyav, ayen d snulfuyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Eerz iyi seg u$wayen n ccwaien. Ee
Eerz iyi, a Mass iw! Ur dgi ppilin
Armi, mi d tusa tmeppant yiwen degsen, inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi
amar ad xedme$ ayen ilhan deg wayen ooi$". Xaii, d awal kan id inna. Tella, deffir es, tse$lit, alamma d ass n tnekra
Ma uuven di lbuq, assen, ur ppemyilin, ur pmesteqsayen
Wid iwumi eeay lmizan nnsen, nitni rebeen
Wid iwumi fessus lmizan nnsen, d nitni i issexsoen iman nnsen. Di Loahennama ad wekkoen
A ppesser$ tmes udmawen nnsen, ad asen zelgen icenfiren
Day ur awen qaren ara issekniyen iW, wanag la ten tnekoem
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! I$leb ane$ ccum nne$. Nella d agdud im$eoqen
A Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$ segs. Ma nesnager, ihi, d imednas ay nella
Ad Yini: "qqimet degs, ur pmeslayet
Ih, illa urbaa n imdanen iW i iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Numen. Semmee ane$, Eun fella$, Kecc Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Tettihim fellasen armi i wen sseppun asmekti W, u tdessem degsen
Nek, assa, Kufa$ ten $ef wayen ueboen. D nitni, war ccekk, ay d imerbae
Inna: "aceal iseggwasen i teqqimem deg wakal
Nnan: "Neqqim ass, ne$ ur ibbwiv wass, steqsi wid ieepben
Inna: "cwii kan ay teqqimen, lemmer, s tidep, day tessinem
Day t$ilem Nxelq ikwen, kan, di rrayaa; ar ur d teppu$alem $uoneÂ£
Ay Meqqweo Oebbi, Agellid, Tidep! Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ukyis
Win inaaoen, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, ur isai ppbut fellas, aqeiii s ar Mass is kan. Ih, ur rebeen ara ijehliyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Semmee u Eun. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
